  • Method Details

    • searchUser

      public User searchUser(String nickname)
      name: searchUser
      Checks if an user is registered under a given nickname.
      pre: Does not apply.
      post: Returns the object of the user if found.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the user to look for.
      Returns:
      user User if it's found.

    • addUser

      public String addUser(int type, String nickname, String id)
      name: addUser
      Adds a consumer user to the system.
      pre: The user's nickname is not registered currently.
      post: The system adds the new user.
      Parameters:
      type - Defines if the consumer is type Standard or Premium.
      nickname - Nickname of the user to register.
      id - Id of the user to register.
      Returns:
      msj. Contains the result of the operation.

    • addUser

      public String addUser(int type, String name, String nickname, String urlImage, String id)
      name: addUser
      Adds a producer user to the system.
      pre: The user's nickname is not registered currently.
      post: The system adds the new user.
      Parameters:
      type - Defines if the producer is an Artist or a Content Creator.
      name - Name of the user to register.
      nickname - Nickname of the user to register.
      urlImage - URL of the user's icon.
      id - Id of the user to register.
      Returns:
      msj. Contains the result of the operation.

    • addAudio

      public String addAudio(String name, String urlImage, String album, double price, int genre, String artist, int timeRep)
      name: addAudio
      Adds a song to the system.
      pre: The artist who is adding the song doesn't have other with the same name.
      post: The system adds the new song.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the song.
      urlImage - Url icon of the song.
      album - Album of the song.
      price - Price of the song.
      genre - Genre of the song (1: Rock, 2: Pop, 3: Trap, 4: House).
      artist - Artist who is adding the song.
      timeRep - Duration in seconds of the song.
      Returns:
      msj. Contains the result of the operation.

    • addAudio

      public String addAudio(String name, String urlImage, String description, int category, String contentProducer, int timeRep)
      name: addAudio
      Adds a podcast to the system.
      pre: The creator content who is adding the podcast doesn't have other with the same name.
      post: The system adds the new podcast.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the podcast.
      urlImage - Url icon of the podcast.
      description - Description of what is the podcast about.
      category - Category of the podcast (1: Politics, 2: Entertainment, 3: Video Games, 4: Fashion).
      contentProducer - Content producer who is adding the podcast.
      timeRep - Duration in seconds of the podcast.
      Returns:
      msj. Contains the result of the operation.

    • addPlaylist

      public String addPlaylist(String name, String user)
      name: addPlaylist
      Adds a playlist to the system.
      pre: The user who is adding the playlist is a consumer and doesn't have other playlist with the same name.
      post: The system adds the new playlist to the user.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the new playlist.
      user - Name of the consumer who is adding the playlist.
      Returns:
      msj. Contains the result of the operation.

    • editPlaylist

      public String editPlaylist(String playlistName, String audioName, String consumerName, String producerName, int option)
      name: editPlaylist
      Modifies a playlist of a consumer.
      pre: The user exists and is a consumer; this user's playlist exists; if the consumer is standard, he will not be able to add more than 20 audios; the audio exists.
      post: The system amodifies a playlist depending of the users request.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - Playlist to be modified.
      audioName - Audio to be added or deleted.
      consumerName - User who is modifying its playlist.
      producerName - Producer of the audio.
      option - Request of the user.
      Returns:
      msj. Contains the result of the operation.
